relation: Darrow1 - #58 Breaking free from their prison, the group sets out to...uh, where are they going again?
Darrow1 - #57 Remember, the best way to make new friends is reveal your dark secrets right off the bat. That way, there's nowhere to go but up!
Darrow1 - #56 A hero arrives! Jeff wraps up his adventure, but not before one last hair-raising performance.
Darrow1 - #55 Jeff takes off in search of Ness and Paula. Also, a quick stop to strike fear in the hearts of Foursiders.
Darrow1 - #54 Dr. Andonuts may be an odd father, but boy does he know how to build a ship.
